component.name: ThemedRowList
component.script:
Sub Init()
print "ThemedRowList:Init"
scene = m.top.getScene() themeChangeNotifier = scene.findNode("themeChangeNotifier") themeChangeNotifier.observeFieldScoped("title", "ThemeChanged")
End Sub
Sub ThemeChanged()
print "ThemedRowList:ThemeChanged"
m.top.rowLabelColor = m.global.theme.textOnBackground m.top.focusBitmapBlendColor = m.global.theme.primary
End Sub
